Class CalendarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, DateChangeListener

    public class CalendarView
extends CustomFragment
implements DateChangeListener
    The Class CalendarView is Fragment class to hold the Calendar view.
